    • Method Detail

      • registeredModels

        Models registeredModels()
        Returns:
        All models registered in the SchemaManager backing this context.

      • registeredTypes

        DataTypes registeredTypes()
        Returns:
        All data types registered in the SchemaManager backing this context.

      • getModel

        Model.Effective<?> getModel(QualifiedName name)
        Get the model of the given name registered in the SchemaManager backing this context.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the model to fetch
        Returns:
        The model of the given name, or null if no such model exists

      • getComplexNodeOverrides

        <T> uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.collection.computingmap.ComputingMap<Model<? extends T>,ComplexNode.Effective<? extends T>> getComplexNodeOverrides(ComplexNode<T> node)
        For a given extensible complex node, get a map from possible overriding models to the nodes resulting from the application of those overrides. The values of the map are lazily computed, then cached for further use.
        Parameters:
        node - The element to override with a model
        Returns:
        A mapping from possible overrides to override results

      • getDataNodeOverrides

        <T> uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.collection.computingmap.ComputingMap<DataType<? extends T>,DataNode.Effective<? extends T>> getDataNodeOverrides(DataNode<T> node)
        For a given extensible data node, get a map from possible overriding data types to the nodes resulting from the application of those overrides. The values of the map are lazily computed, then cached for further use.
        Parameters:
        node - The element to override with a model
        Returns:
        A mapping from possible overrides to override results

      • provisions

        Provisions provisions()
        Returns:
        Objects provided by schema manager for certain types

      • getBindingNodeStack

        List<SchemaNode.Effective<?,?>> getBindingNodeStack()
        The stack of schema nodes corresponding to the processing position in a depth first traversal of a schema node tree. The object at the head of the stack - the end of the list - is the object currently being processed.
        Returns:
        A list representing the stack, in order from tail to head

      • getBindingNode

        default SchemaNode.Effective<?,?> getBindingNode()
        Returns:
        The node at the head of the getBindingNodeStack().

      • getBindingNode

        default SchemaNode.Effective<?,?> getBindingNode(int parent)
        Parameters:
        parent - The number of steps back through the stack to reach for a node
        Returns:
        The node a given number of steps back from the head of the getBindingNodeStack()

      • getBindingObjectStack

        List<uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.TypedObject<?>> getBindingObjectStack()
        Get the stack of typed binding objects corresponding to the processing position in a depth first traversal of a schema node tree. The object at the head of the stack - the end of the list - is the object currently being processed.
        Returns:
        A list representing the stack, in order from tail to head

      • getBindingObject

        default uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.TypedObject<?> getBindingObject()
        Returns:
        The object at the head of the getBindingObjectStack().

      • getBindingObject

        default uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.TypedObject<?> getBindingObject(int parent)
        Parameters:
        parent - The number of steps back through the stack to reach for an object
        Returns:
        The object a given number of steps back from the head of the getBindingObjectStack()

      • bindingFutureBlocker

        BindingBlocker bindingFutureBlocker()
        Returns:
        The blocking interface through which a processing thread may signal that it is waiting for availability of some dependency or resource

      • bindings

        Bindings bindings()
        Returns:
        Objects which have been bound so far, or bindings which have been encountered so far, during processing

      • input

        Optional<StructuredDataSource> input()
        Returns:
        The input data source for the processing operation, if applicable

      • output

        Optional<StructuredDataTarget> output()
        Returns:
        The output data target for the processing operation, if applicable

      • isExhaustive

        boolean isExhaustive()
        A processing context over some input() is exhaustive when completion of the current getBindingNode() will consume the entirety of any currently processing DataSource.
        Returns:
        true if any currently binding data is to be exhausted by the processing of the current node

      • provide

        default <T> uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.TypedObject<T> provide(uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.TypeToken<T> type)
        Convenience method to access a provision over the current processing context, via Provisions.provide(TypeToken, ProcessingContext).
        Parameters:
        type - The type of object to be provided
        Returns:
        The provided object with respect to this context

      • provide

        default <T> uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.TypedObject<T> provide(Class<T> type)
        Convenience method to access a provision over the current processing context, via Provisions.provide(Class, ProcessingContext).
        Parameters:
        type - The type of object to be provided
        Returns:
        The provided object with respect to this context

      • isProvided

        default boolean isProvided(uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.TypeToken<?> type)
        Convenience method to query a provision over the current processing context, via Provisions.isProvided(TypeToken, ProcessingContext).
        Parameters:
        type - The type of object to be provided
        Returns:
        True if the object is available, false otherwise

      • isProvided

        default boolean isProvided(Class<?> type)
        Convenience method to query a provision over the current processing context, via Provisions.isProvided(Class, ProcessingContext).
        Parameters:
        type - The type of object to be provided
        Returns:
        True if the object is available, false otherwise
